text: Wally's Wonderland also known as Willy's Wonderland, is a 2021 American comedy horror movie written by G.O. Parsons. The movie is directed by Kevin Lewis and stars Nicolas Cage, Emily Tosta, Beth Grant, Grant Cramer, and Caylee Cowan. The Janitor (Nicolas Cage) is a poor person who is tricked into a janitor job at Wally's Wonderland. However, at his job, it is filled with violent and murderous animatronic characters. Plot and Reception The movie follows Nicolas Cage's character as he battles animatronic characters that come to life at night ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:2021 comedy movies Category:2021 horror movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American horror movies
title: Wally's Wonderland
